Company: SoftNis IT Management Services Private Limited.
Job Description:
Candidates having Engineering Degree or Diploma in Mechanical/ Automobile/ Industrial Production/ Instrumentation Technology/ Electrical and Electronic (EEE)/ Electronics and Communication (EC) stream with 2-4 years of Experience in Similar or any Process Industry in Production/ Quality Assurance. Good English Communication Skills are a Must. 

We look for ability,  attitude and interest. Apart from the experience,  you'll need to be self-motivated to learn & update your skills to experiment with new technologies /  market trends.
